summary: Just a small retexture well removal to be exact
descriptionHtml:
this is just a small removal of an unwanted texter on the Tera vir Armour, this is just a small removal of stuff, So you will need the mod https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846/? 
DONT FORGET TO EXTRACT ! 
<br />
<br />Installation : You need the original mod, which is done by the amazing author in the link above
<br />1-download the file
<br />2-assuming you downloaded the mod, now you just need to go to your skyrim game folder/data/textuers/Tera armour/zTeraviridinium drop it there, and make sure to back up the original one incase you did not like it
<br />3- done ! 
You still need the orignal mod from the link above , and the original auther is asianboy345
author: Howrang44
